books.title: THE COVENANT OF WATER

books.author: David Baldacci
books.description: The second book in the 6:20 Man series. Travis Devine investigates the murder of the C.I.A. operative Jenny Silkwell in rural Maine. Read by Zachary Webber, Erin Cottrell, Will Collyer, Erin Bennett and Tiffany Smith. 11 hours, 45 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE EDGE

books.author: Barbara Kingsolver
books.description: Winner of a 2023 Pulitzer Prize for fiction. A reimagining of Charles Dickens’s “David Copperfield” set in the mountains of southern Appalachia. Read by Charlie Thurston. 21 hours, 3 minutes unabridged.
books.title: DEMON COPPERHEAD

books.author: Michael Connelly
books.description: The seventh book in the Lincoln Lawyer series. Haller and Bosch team up to prove the innocence of a woman in prison for killing her husband. Read by Peter Giles, Titus Welliver and Christine Lakin. 10 hours, 29 minutes unabridged.
books.title: RESURRECTION WALK

books.author: Shel Van Pelt
books.description: A widow working the night shift at the Sowell Bay Aquarium is aided in solving a mystery by a giant Pacific octopus living there. Read by Marin Ireland and Michael Urie. 11 hours, 16 minutes unabridged.
books.title: REMARKABLY BRIGHT CREATURES

books.author: Andy Weir
books.description: Ryland Grace awakes from a long sleep alone and far from home, and the fate of humanity rests on his shoulders. Read by Ray Porter. 16 hours, 10 minutes unabridged.
books.title: PROJECT HAIL MARY

books.author: Nora Roberts
books.description: After the death of her mysterious uncle, a graphic designer receives an inheritance that stipulates she must live in a haunted Victorian house for at least three years. Read by Brittany Pressley and the author. 13 hours, 58 minutes unabridged.
books.title: INHERITANCE

books.author: Sarah J. Maas
books.description: The second book in the Crescent City series. Bryce Quinlan and Hunt Athalar must choose to fight or stay silent. Read by Elizabeth Evans. 27 hours, 42 minutes unabridged.
books.title: HOUSE OF SKY AND BREATH

books.author: Liz Cheney
books.description: The former congresswoman from Wyoming recounts how she helped lead the Select Committee to Investigate the Jan. 6. Attack on the United States Capitol. Read by the author. 12 hours, 14 minutes unabridged.
books.title: OATH AND HONOR

books.author: Britney Spears
books.description: The Grammy Award-winning pop star details her personal and professional experiences, including the years she spent under a conservatorship overseen by her father. Read by Michelle Williams. 5 hours, 31 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE WOMAN IN ME

books.author: Peter Attia with Bill Gifford
books.contributor: by Peter Attia with Bill Gifford
books.description: A look at recent scientific research on aging and longevity. Read by Peter Attia. 17 hours, 8 minutes unabridged.
books.title: OUTLIVE

books.author: Matthew Perry
books.description: The actor, known for playing Chandler Bing on “Friends,” shares stories from his childhood and his struggles with sobriety. Read by the author. 8 hours, 49 minutes unabridged.
books.title: FRIENDS, LOVERS, AND THE BIG TERRIBLE THING

books.author: Walter Isaacson
books.description: The author of “The Code Breaker” traces Musk’s life and summarizes his work on electric vehicles, private space exploration and artificial intelligence. Read by Jeremy Bobb. 20 hours, 27 minutes unabridged.
books.title: ELON MUSK

books.author: David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil. The fledgling F.B.I. intervened, ineffectively. Read by Will Patton, Ann Marie Lee and Danny Campbell. 9 hours, 45 minutes unabridged.
books.title: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON

books.author: Barbra Streisand
books.description: The EGOT winner chronicles her journey in show business and reveals details about some of her personal relationships. Read by the author. 48 hours, 15 minutes unabridged.
books.title: MY NAME IS BARBRA

books.author: Daniel James Brown
books.description: The story of the American rowers who pursued gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympic Games; the basis of the film. Read by Edward Herrmann. 14 hours, 25 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: Tim Alberta
books.description: The author of “American Carnage” looks at divisions within the American evangelical movement. Read by the author. 18 hours, 15 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE KINGDOM, THE POWER, AND THE GLORY

books.author: David Grann
books.description: The survivors of a shipwrecked British vessel on a secret mission during an imperial war with Spain have different accounts of events. Read by Dion Graham and the author. 8 hours, 28 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE WAGER

books.author: Paris Hilton
books.description: The entrepreneur and pop culture icon shares her personal and professional rise in the age of influencers. Read by the author. 8 hours, 22 minutes unabridged.
books.title: PARIS

books.author: Matthew McConaughey
books.description: The Academy Award-winning actor shares snippets from the diaries he kept over 35 years. Read by the author. 6 hours, 42 minutes unabridged.
books.title: GREENLIGHTS

books.author: Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery. Read by Sean Pratt. 16 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: Jennette McCurdy
books.description: The actress and filmmaker describes her eating disorders and difficult relationship with her mother. Read by the author. 6 hours, 25 minutes unabridged.
books.title: I'M GLAD MY MOM DIED

books.author: Rachel Maddow
books.description: The MSNBC host and co-author of “Bag Man” details a campaign to overthrow the U.S. government and install authoritarian rule prior to and during our involvement in World War II. Read by the author. 13 hours, 10 minutes unabridged.
books.title: PREQUEL

books.author: Rick Rubin with Neil Strauss
books.contributor: by Rick Rubin with Neil Strauss
books.title: THE CREATIVE ACT

books.author: Arthur C. Brooks and Oprah Winfrey
books.contributor: by Arthur C. Brooks and Oprah Winfrey
books.title: BUILD THE LIFE YOU WANT

books.author: Ramit Sethi
books.title: I WILL TEACH YOU TO BE RICH, SECOND EDITION

books.author: Douglas Brunt
books.title: THE MYSTERIOUS CASE OF RUDOLF DIESEL

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The fifth book in the Cat Kid Comic Club series. As publication seems possible, the baby frogs feel doubt.
books.title: INFLUENCERS

books.author: Alice Oseman
books.description: Charlie wants to take his relationship with Nick, who will go to university next year, to a new level.
books.title: HEARTSTOPPER, VOL. 5

books.author: Tui T. Sutherland.
books.contributor: by Tui T. Sutherland. Illustrated by Mike Holmes
books.description: The seventh book in the Wings of Fire graphic novel series. Winter must face his family in the Ice Kingdom.
books.title: WINTER TURNING

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The 11th book in the Dog Man series. Piggy returns and the Supa Buddies are sabotaged.
books.title: TWENTY THOUSAND FLEAS UNDER THE SEA

books.author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
books.description: Asa’s new friend may have a secret and Denji questions his own competence as he considers revealing his identity.
books.title: CHAINSAW MAN, VOL. 13

books.author: Ann M. Martin.
books.contributor: by Ann M. Martin. Illustrated by Ellen T. Crenshaw
books.description: The 14th book in the Baby-Sitters Club graphic novel series. Members of the club have different reactions to visiting New York City.
books.title: STACEY'S MISTAKE

books.author: Aaron Blabey
books.description: The 18th book in the Bad Guys series. New revelations emerge as one character finds her voice.
books.title: THE BAD GUYS IN LOOK WHO'S TALKING

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The ninth book in the Dog Man series. After turning in his badge, the canine cop is determined not to just roll over.
books.title: GRIME AND PUNISHMENT

books.author: Ann M. Martin.
books.contributor: by Ann M. Martin. Illustrated by Arley Nopra
books.description: The 15th book in the Baby-Sitters Club graphic novel series. Things escalate when a practical joker causes Claudia to break her leg.
books.title: CLAUDIA AND THE BAD JOKE

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The 10th book in the Dog Man series. Can the power of love overcome the darkness and despair created by new villains?
books.title: MOTHERING HEIGHTS

books.author: Kohei Horikoshi
books.description: Several battles take place around Japan.
books.title: MY HERO ACADEMIA, VOL. 36

books.author: Scott Cawthon, Elley Cooper and Carly Anne West.
books.contributor: by Scott Cawthon, Elley Cooper and Carly Anne West. Illustrated by Didi Esmeralda, Anthony Morris Jr. and Andi Santagata

books.title: TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES: THE LAST RONIN

books.author: Scott Cawthon, Kelly Parra and Andrea Waggener.
books.contributor: by Scott Cawthon, Kelly Parra and Andrea Waggener. Illustrated by Didi Esmeralda, Coryn MacPherson and Diana Camero

books.title: FIVE NIGHTS AT FREDDY'S: FAZBEAR FRIGHTS, VOL. 3

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The fourth book in the Cat Kid Comic Club series. After doing their chores, baby frogs work together to create more mini-comics.
books.title: COLLABORATIONS

books.author: Lee Child
books.description: The 11th book in the Jack Reacher series. Reacher must discover who is hunting members of a team of former military investigators.
books.title: BAD LUCK AND TROUBLE

books.author: Danielle Steel
books.description: Charles Vincent meets someone who ignites his passion and must decide whether to walk away from his perfect-from-the-outside life.
books.title: WITHOUT A TRACE

books.author: James Patterson
books.description: Three thrillers: “3 Days to Live,” “Women and Children First” and “The Housekeepers.”
books.title: 3 DAYS TO LIVE

books.author: Nora Roberts
books.description: On a snowy night in Colorado, a man saves a stranded pregnant woman and joins her custody battle after falling in love.
books.title: GABRIEL'S ANGEL

books.author: Marc Cameron
books.description: The 22nd book in the Jack Ryan series. Ryan goes behind the Berlin Wall in 1985 to investigate an East German defector.
books.title: TOM CLANCY: RED WINTER

books.author: James Patterson and Nancy Allen
books.contributor: by James Patterson and Nancy Allen
books.description: A young lawyer winds up in an Alabama jail that remains mysteriously crowded.
books.title: THE JAILHOUSE LAWYER

books.author: William W. Johnstone and J.A. Johnstone
books.contributor: by William W. Johnstone and J.A. Johnstone
books.description: A gang of bank robbers, a medicine man and a giant grizzly bear complicate matters for Smoke Jensen.
books.title: DARK NIGHT OF THE MOUNTAIN MAN

books.author: C.J. Box
books.description: The sixth book in the Cassie Dewell series. Cassie works two cases involving buried treasure and a con man.
books.title: TREASURE STATE

books.author: Stephen King
books.description: A collection of short stories that blend fantasy and psychological realism.
books.title: JUST AFTER SUNSET

books.author: William W. Johnstone and J.A. Johnstone
books.contributor: by William W. Johnstone and J.A. Johnstone
books.description: Two men who met in a Wyoming saloon brawl start a stagecoach line in 1866.
books.title: THE FRONTIER OVERLAND COMPANY

books.author: Debbie Macomber
books.description: Two holiday stories: “When Christmas Comes” and “Christmas Letters.”
books.title: FOREVER UNDER THE MISTLETOE

books.author: Jack Du Brul
books.description: The 13th book in the Isaac Bell adventure series. Bell searches for a technology that helps the Germans rule the seas in the summer of 1914.
books.title: CLIVE CUSSLER: THE SEA WOLVES

books.author: John Grisham
books.description: Two childhood friends follow in their fathers’ footsteps, which puts them on opposite sides of the law.
books.title: THE BOYS FROM BILOXI

books.author: Jack Carr
books.description: The sixth book in the Terminal List series. The killing of a freshman congressman reverberates for decades and James Reece faces a global conspiracy.
books.title: ONLY THE DEAD

books.author: Sandra Brown
books.description: A former football star falls for a state prosecutor at the same time he must decide whether to kill his ex-wife, who is on life support, to ensnare her attacker.
books.title: OVERKILL
